entities.name: gryffindor common room
entities.description: The Gryffindor common room is where Harry returned to the fire with Ron.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who broke in his new chess set and lost spectacularly to Ron.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is Harry's friend who played chess with him and got help from Percy.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is Ron's brother who tried to help Harry play chess but made things worse.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is one of the twins who stole Percy's prefect badge and was chased by him.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is Fred's twin brother who also stole Percy's prefect badge.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak was sent to Harry but he didn't think about it until later.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron played chess together, with Percy trying to help Harry.
Percy chased Fred and George all over Gryffindor Tower because they stole his prefect badge.
Harry received the Invisibility Cloak but didn't think about it until later.
